title: RXO vs. C.H. Robinson: the growing financial divide widens some more
description: RXO credit rating faces challenges, while C.H. Robinson continues to shine. The post RXO vs. C.H. Robinson: the growing financial divide widens some more...
content: The growing financial gap between RXO and C.H. Robinson, the two largest publicly-traded brokerages who also carry publicly-traded debt, grew more stark this week with an action taken by S&P Glob… [+6075 chars]
